message.content:
cs.CR, cs.CY, cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.DB

The paper discusses the use of blockchain for improving the security and decentralization of Industry 4.0 applications, which falls under the category of cybersecurity (cs.CR) and cyber-physical systems (cs.CY). It also involves the development of smart contracts (cs.SE) and the use of Big Data (cs.DB) for analyzing industrial processes. Finally, the paper discusses the use of robotics and IIoT, which can be categorized under distributed computing (cs.DC).
